get: Sets the "return" variable to the selected of the values below
set: Sets one of the values below

set.min-x: Sets the minimum x position of the left of a window
set.max-x: Sets the maximum x position of the right of a window
set.min-y: Sets the minimum y position of the bottom of a window
set.max-y: Sets the maximum y position of the top of a window

sound.kill: kills any sound that is playing

get.pan: Returns the left/right pan of the system

set.pan: Sets the left/right pan of the system

account.details: Returns details about the current logged in account
account.logout: Logs you out and reboots the system
account.login: Attempts to log you into another account on the device

local.getkey: Returns the value of the designated key from local storage
local.namespace: Sets the local storage namespace to the input value
local.delete: Allows you to remove a key from local storage
local.clearall: deletes all keys in the current namespace
